message: So, how are you using tarpipe? ;)
Sounds interesting. Wonder how much work it involves
We are using it to receive contributions to dailyphotowall.net. We want to be able to pick up and leave if tumblr dies... Tarpipe gives us control and it's kinda futureproof. ;)
to publish news about your company/project/whatever into a convore group
Nice! I'm thinking about creating a convore connector, what do you think?
It's pretty new... Hmmm... What use-case can you think of? Regardless, the more the merrier. :)
Creating the connector should be straightforward. You can then use it inside any workflow so the possibilities are endless, I'd say.
+1 on the https. Go for it but I don't expect to like automated junk on convore... Not sure yet.
you can even have private groups
I'm looking at convore's API now: https://convore.com/api/
It's like twitter all over again, but better
I agree, feels like a natural extension to twitter
